headline.main: 2 NAVY TRANSPORTS LOST IN SOLOMONS; Casualties Reported Light in Sinking of U.S. Liner and Converted Destroyer NAVY TRANSPORTS LOST IN SOLOMONS

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 30 -- Two naval transports, one of medium size and one a small converted destroyer, were lost in action in the Solomon Islands, the Navy Department announced today.
abstract: Solomon Islands: US transport George F Elliott, another transport and destroyer Gregory reptd lost in action; Gregory's capt, Lt Comdr H P Bauer, reptd missing; Elliott s comdr, Capt W O Bailey, reptd saved
snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 30 -- Two naval transports, one of medium size and one a small converted destroyer, were lost in action in the Solomon Islands, the Navy Department announced today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
